[HostSailor](https://hostsailor.com) has established itself as a trusted provider of high quality [VPS Hosting](https://hostsailor.com/vps-hosting/), [Shared Hosting](https://hostsailor.com/ssd-shared-hosting/), [Dedicated servers](https://hostsailor.com/dedicated-servers/supermicro-romania-dedicated-servers/), [Domains](https://hostsailor.com/domain-registration/), and [SSL Certificates](https://hostsailor.com/ssl-certificates/) with top notch support and impeccable reputation and also offers some of the most competitive pricing, without sacrificing on the quality of the products and services.

[HostSailor](https://hostsailor.com) is based in Dubai, UAE and the services are physically located in Romania & Netherlands, all servers are 100% owned, we do not resell any of our VPS services.


Operating systems: ( The majority of all Linux and Windows operating systems, if we don't have it we will install it for you too! )
